text: Bitcoin is a decentralized digital currency that operates on a peer-to-peer network without the need for intermediaries such as banks.
HODL is a term in crypto culture meaning to hold onto your coins long-term despite volatility, based on the belief in future gains.
Yield farming involves depositing crypto into decentralized finance protocols to earn rewards, often in the form of governance tokens.
NFTs, or Non-Fungible Tokens, are unique digital assets stored on a blockchain that represent ownership of digital or physical items.
Never share your private keys. Use hardware wallets or multi-signature wallets for better security against hacks.
Decentralization shifts power from centralized authorities to distributed networks, giving individuals more control and reducing censorship.
